External_Reference.reference_text: Michael W. Davis, Kurt D. Retherford, Philippa M. Molyneux, G. Randall Gladstone, Noel Eloriaga, Rohini S. Giles, Thomas K. Greathouse, Ujjwal Raut, Todd J. Veach, Sue Ferrell, Maarten H. Versteeg, Matthew A. Freeman, Kristian B. Persson. Europa clipper ultraviolet spectrograph: ground calibration results. Proc. SPIE 12181, Space Telescopes and Instrumentation 2022: Ultraviolet to Gamma Ray, 1218138 (2022). doi: 10.1117/12.2630530.
External_Reference.description: Describes the radiometric performance and ground calibration results of the Europa Clipper Ultraviolet Spectrograph (Europa-UVS).

Instrument.name: Europa Ultraviolet Spectrograph (Europa UVS)
Instrument.description: By collecting ultraviolet light with a telescope, and creating images, the Europa Ultraviolet Spectrograph will help determine the composition of Europaâ€™s atmospheric gases and surface materials. It will also search near Europa for signs of plume activity.
